TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ShareCompat extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Extra helper functionality for sharing data between activities.

remarks.para:
Extra helper functionality for sharing data between activities.
ShareCompat provides functionality to extend the / protocol and support retrieving more info about the activity that invoked a social sharing action.
provides helper functions for constructing a sharing intent that always includes data about the calling activity and app. This lets the called activity provide attribution for the app that shared content. Constructing an intent this way can be done in a method-chaining style. To obtain an IntentBuilder with info about your calling activity, use the static method .
provides helper functions for parsing the defined extras within an or intent used to launch an activity. You can also obtain a Drawable for the caller's application icon and the application's localized label (the app's human-readable name). Social apps that enable sharing content are encouraged to use this information to call out the app that the content was shared from.

The constructor will initializes the property of the new instance using and .

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ConfigureMenuItem (Android.Views.IMenuItem item, Android.Support.V4.App.ShareCompat.IntentBuilder shareIntent);
.method public static hidebysig void ConfigureMenuItem(class Android.Views.IMenuItem item, class Android.Support.V4.App.ShareCompat/IntentBuilder shareIntent) cil managed

Docs.param: IntentBuilder with data about the content to share
Docs.summary: Configure a to act as a sharing action.

remarks.para:
Configure a to act as a sharing action.
Call . If the app is running on API level 11 or above and uses the Action Bar its menu will be recreated and rebuilt. If not, the activity will receive a call to the next time the user presses the menu key to open the options menu panel. The activity can then call configureMenuItem again with a new or altered IntentBuilder to reconfigure the share menu item.
Keep a reference to the MenuItem object for the share item once it has been created and call configureMenuItem to update the associated sharing intent as needed.

If the app is running on API level 14 or higher (Android 4.0/Ice Cream Sandwich) this method will configure a ShareActionProvider to provide a more robust UI for selecting the target of the share. History will be tracked for each calling activity in a file named with the prefix ".sharecompat_" in the application's private data directory. If the application wishes to set this MenuItem to show as an action in the Action Bar it should use to request that behavior in addition to calling this method.
If the app is running on an older platform version this method will configure a standard activity chooser dialog for the menu item.
During the calling activity's lifecycle, if data within the share intent must change the app should change that state in one of several ways:

.method public static hidebysig void ConfigureMenuItem(class Android.Views.IMenu menu, int32 menuItemId, class Android.Support.V4.App.ShareCompat/IntentBuilder shareIntent) cil managed

Docs.summary: Intent extra that stores the name of the calling package for an ACTION_SEND intent.

remarks.para:
Intent extra that stores the name of the calling package for an ACTION_SEND intent. When an activity is started using startActivityForResult this is redundant info. (It is also provided by .)
Instead of using this constant directly, consider using or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Android.Content.ComponentName GetCallingActivity(class Android.App.Activity calledActivity) cil managed

Docs.param: Current activity that was launched to share content
Docs.summary: Retrieve the ComponentName of the activity that launched calledActivity from a share intent.

remarks.para: Retrieve the ComponentName of the activity that launched calledActivity from a share intent. Apps that provide social sharing functionality can use this to provide attribution for the app that shared the content.
Note: This data may have been provided voluntarily by the calling application. As such it should not be trusted for accuracy in the context of security or verification.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string GetCallingPackage(class Android.App.Activity calledActivity) cil managed

Docs.param: Current activity that was launched to share content
Docs.summary: Retrieve the name of the package that launched calledActivity from a share intent.

remarks.para: Retrieve the name of the package that launched calledActivity from a share intent. Apps that provide social sharing functionality can use this to provide attribution for the app that shared the content.
Note: This data may have been provided voluntarily by the calling application. As such it should not be trusted for accuracy in the context of security or verification.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
